s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.3.5. If you experience issues with this release please check the list of known issues.

s2.message: "Recommend us on Facebook" button can now be easily hidden (click the cross next to it).

s4.message:
Improved display of web addresses in Adblock Plus user interface for right-to-left
    languages (Hebrew, Arabic).

s5.message: Fixed: Web interfaces of some routers expect Connection header to be always last and are broken by Do Not Track header (bug 23845).

s6.message:
Fixed: Adblock Plus user interface is broken in Thunderbird and SeaMonkey Mail if a
    non-default window layout is used.

s7.message: Fixed: Flash is broken in outdated Firefox 3.6.x versions (up to Firefox 3.6.12).

s8.message: Fixed: Redirect blocking feature has a negative impact on memory management in Firefox (bug 645678).

s9.message:
Side-effect:
    redirect blocking will no longer work in Firefox Mobile 4 due to

s12.message: Fixed: Issue reporter claims "too many filter subscriptions" even if the subscriptions are disabled.

s13.message: Fixed: Middle-clicking ABP icon has seemingly no effect if Adblock Plus is disabled on the page.
